languages.text: {n}Мир останавливается на сколько-то мгновений, но краем глаза вы замечаете, как лицо Пощады перекашивает болезненная гримаса.{/n}
{n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мир останавливается на сколько-то мгновений, но краем глаза вы замечаете, как лицо Пощады перекашивает болезненная гримаса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}
{n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}
{n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}
{n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}整个世界都停滞了下来，但你通过眼角的余光，看到悯慈的脸扭曲着，充满了狰狞与痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}整个世界都停滞了下来，但你通过眼角的余光，看到悯慈的脸扭曲着，充满了狰狞与痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}世界はしばらくの間止まっていた。だが、視界の隅でマーシーの顔が苦痛に歪むのが見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}世界はしばらくの間止まっていた。だが、視界の隅でマーシーの顔が苦痛に歪むのが見えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mundo se detiene durante unos segundos, pero por el rabillo del ojo ves que la cara de Mercy es una mueca de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mundo se detiene durante unos segundos, pero por el rabillo del ojo ves que la cara de Mercy es una mueca de dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, le monde s'arrêter de tourner, mais du coin de l'œil, vous voyez une grimace de douleur déformer le visage de Mercy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, le monde s'arrêter de tourner, mais du coin de l'œil, vous voyez une grimace de douleur déformer le visage de Mercy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Für einige Augenblicke bleibt die Welt stehen, aber aus den Augenwinkeln erkennst du, wie sich Mercys Gesicht zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse verwandelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einige Augenblicke bleibt die Welt stehen, aber aus den Augenwinkeln erkennst du, wie sich Mercys Gesicht zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse verwandelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir süreliğine dünya dursa da gözünün kenarıyla Merhamet'in yüzünün acılı bir şekilde buruştuğunu görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world stops for several moments, but out of the corner of your eye you can see Mercy's face twist into a pained grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir süreliğine dünya duruyor ancak gözünün kenarından Merhamet'in yüzünün acılı bir şekilde buruştuğunu görebiliyorsun.{/n}
